Trigger An ally is about to be hit by a Strike from a creature within striding distance.

You are determined to save an ally from danger, no matter how far they might be. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, and Stride up to your speed towards the triggering ally. If you end your movement next to your ally, you can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.5vXc2s2siR1ihpBT]{Shield Warden} to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} block the triggering hit as part of this reaction.

You can spend a focus point to Stride at such a speed that this movement does not trigger reactions or to Shove the attacking creature after blocking the attack.
